resources.string: Roll to Hit is a live play, 5th edition Dungeons and Dragons podcast. Join in on the adventure as our heroes go on epic quests, battle fierce monsters, level up, and find sweet loot.

The Bearded Vegans finds hosts Paul and Andy in a discussion dissecting all things vegan. News, reviews, interviews and in depth discussion of issues within the vegan community are regular features of the show.
The Unwind is a discussion about topics related to tech, games, gadgets, and other aspects of geek culture. Rob, Shawn, and Josiah each bring a topic they find important to the show every week.

Set starting two years after the battle of Yavin, join the crew of the Daring Escape as they travel the galaxy dodging pirates, swindling the Hutts, learning about themselves, and generally trying not to get blown up. This homebrew Star Wars RPG issues the Fantasy Flight Games Edge of the Empire, Age of Rebellion, and Force and Destiny systems. It uses the Star Wars canon as a backdrop and some of the Characters and setting come into the game as cameos.
